Last minute gifting made easy for food lovers! Our eGift Cards deliver delicious meals and holiday cheer - send instantly or schedule for Christmas Day.????Link in bio. #doughzone #egiftcard #gifting #christmas #foodies

New dumpling obsession unlocked ???? @doughzoneusa Dough Zone Dumpling House in Berkeley is a must-try if you love handmade Chinese comfort food done right!! Everything tasted amazing ?? It’s the kind of spot you immediately want to come back to ??

We (uncle Paul??) ordered:
Sweet and sour cucumber salad
Green onion pancake
Pork soup dumplings
Pork with crab soup dumplings
Pan fried pork buns
Pork and shrimp boiled dumplings
Pork wonton
Dan Dan noodles
Egg fried rice
Banana naan bread

The soup dumplings were rich, the buns were crispy on the outside and fluffy inside, and the noodles had just the right kick!! My fav was the pork buns!

If dumplings are your love language, add this Berkeley spot to your list ASAP ????

Happy Thanksgiving!
If you’re craving something festive, our Pumpkin XLB is on the menu all weekend - like pumpkin pie, but in a dumpling!

Most WA, OR, and CA locations will be open on Thanksgiving - we‘re grateful to be part of your traditions. (Please note: All Houston (TX) locations and the Clackamas (OR) location will be closed on Thanksgiving Day.)

#doughzone #thanksgiving #happythanksgivng #seasonal #happyholidays
